headlines.description: Arsenal were held to a 2-2 draw at Norwich City in Freddie Ljungberg's first game in charge as interim head coach.
headlines.shortLinkText: Arsenal rescue draw in Ljungberg's first game

headlines.description: A superb second-half header by Matt Doherty cancelled out an early goal by Lys Mousset as Wolverhampton Wanderers came from behind to draw 1-1.
headlines.shortLinkText: Wolves extend unbeaten run to nine games

headlines.description: Leicester City reclaimed second spot in the Premier League in dramatic fashion as Kelechi Iheanacho's stoppage-time goal earned them a 2-1 victory.
headlines.shortLinkText: Iheanacho's last-gasp strike puts Leicester second

headlines.description: Manchester United failed to win for the third consecutive game after a 2-2 draw against Aston Vila at Old Trafford.
headlines.shortLinkText: Man United frustrated by Aston Villa in 2-2 draw
